references.reason: This paper introduces a framework for addressing fairness concerns in machine learning, which is a central theme of the target paper.
This paper introduces the method of label propagation, which is a core technique used in the target paper to handle noisy labels.

references.paper_title: Why does throwing away data improve worst-group error?
references.reason: This paper provides a theoretical analysis of the impact of data downsampling on worst-group accuracy, which is directly relevant to the target paper's focus on improving fairness metrics.

references.paper_title: On the resistance of nearest neighbor to random noisy labels
references.reason: This paper offers theoretical analysis on the robustness of k-NN to noisy labels, which is directly relevant to the core methodology of the target paper.

references.paper_title: Last layer re-training is sufficient for robustness to spurious correlations
references.reason: This paper investigates the effectiveness of last-layer retraining for fairness, which is a key method compared and improved in the target paper.
